body_html:
@WahabZia Sorry you faced issues trying to run TF. If you installed for GPU support I need you to:

  1. Check if your %CUDA_HOME% is properly set and CUDA and cuDNN DLLs directories are in your PATH.
  2. After that if the issue persists install the Visual C++ Redistributable 2015 x64 as MSVCP140.DLL may be missing in your system.

Thanks for filling the issue and feel free to ask any questions or doubts you may still have about TensorFlow.
body_text:
@WahabZia Sorry you faced issues trying to run TF. If you installed for GPU support I need you to:

Check if your %CUDA_HOME% is properly set and CUDA and cuDNN DLLs directories are in your PATH.
After that if the issue persists install the Visual C++ Redistributable 2015 x64 as MSVCP140.DLL may be missing in your system.

Thanks for filling the issue and feel free to ask any questions or doubts you may still have about TensorFlow.
body:
@WahabZia Sorry you faced issues trying to run TF. If you installed for GPU support I need you to:
1. Check if your `%CUDA_HOME%` is properly set and CUDA and cuDNN DLLs directories are in your `PATH`. 
2. After that if the issue persists install the [Visual C++ Redistributable 2015 x64](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=53587) as `MSVCP140.DLL` may be missing in your system. 

Thanks for filling the issue and feel free to ask any questions or doubts you may still have about TensorFlow.
